selections.name: Royal Flush Deo
selections.reason: Macdonald driving for Gladu. Solid qualifier on Jan 16 with a 29.1 kicker. Looks ready to fire off the bench.

selections.name: Green Grass Grows
selections.reason: Consistent form with a 29.3 last quarter in the snow last out. Draws well and should be close to the pace.

selections.name: Green Goose
selections.reason: Highest speed figure (101) in the field, but handicapped by the 10-hole. If Ratchford can navigate traffic, he's a major threat.

danger_horse.name: Overend
danger_horse.reason: Rail draw and decent recent form make him a threat to hit the board at odds.

selections.name: Crown Monarch
selections.reason: Massive class drop from NW6500L4 to NW2500L4. Speed figure of 113 towers over most of this field. Rail draw seals the deal.

selections.name: Like Chaos
selections.reason: Possesses the highest speed figure (117) but deals with Post 9. Henry will need to send him early.

selections.name: Buck Dancer
selections.reason: Roy driving for Auciello. Speed 116 fits well here, and the inside post is an advantage over the 9.

danger_horse.name: Donatover
danger_horse.reason: McNair aboard with a 115 speed figure. Capable of upsetting if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Southwind Mac
selections.reason: McNair driving. Drops from NW2500L4. Speed 104 is competitive and should improve in this spot.

selections.name: French Vodka
selections.reason: McClure aboard. Speed 107 indicates ability. Good post to stalk the leaders.

selections.name: Charlie Cheeks
selections.reason: Roy driving. Consistent type who draws inside. Good use for vertical exotics.

danger_horse.name: Resolved Issues
danger_horse.reason: Borth driving. Has shown flashes of speed (84) but needs a trip from post 7.

selections.name: Volcanic
selections.reason: McNair driving. Speed 100. Recent form is solid enough to overcome the post in this claiming handicap.

selections.name: Chef
selections.reason: Roy driving. Speed 100. Consistent closer who should benefit if the pace is hot.

selections.name: Haka Timatanga
selections.reason: Speed 113 is the class of the field, but recent form is mixed. Davis needs to maximize the inside draw.

danger_horse.name: Crazin Party Boy
danger_horse.reason: Speed 116 is dangerous from the rail. Could steal it if left alone.

selections.name: Chic Choc Rose
selections.reason: Macdonald driving. Speed 121 is elite for this group. Should control the race from post 4.

selections.name: Sunday Shoes
selections.reason: McNair driving. Speed 122 matches the top pick. This looks like a two-horse race on paper.

selections.name: Supersonic Hanover
selections.reason: Plante driving. Speed 100. Good inside draw to sit the pocket behind the top two.

danger_horse.name: Flashchap
danger_horse.reason: Speed 121 is right there with the favorites, but post 9 makes the trip difficult.

selections.name: Kinnder Icecube
selections.reason: Moore driving. 3-1 ML favorite. Consistent speed (99) and draws well.

selections.name: Acrobatic
selections.reason: Ratchford driving. Speed 102 is tops among the main contenders. 7-2 odds offer value.

selections.name: Tie Game
selections.reason: Macdonald driving. Always a factor with this driver change. Look for improvement.

danger_horse.name: Zillennial
danger_horse.reason: Young driving. 5-1 ML. Speed 93 is competitive if he can overcome the post.

selections.name: Belmont Blazer
selections.reason: Cullen driving. Speed 120 is excellent. Must overcome post 10, but has the class to do it.

selections.name: Smiles For Miles
selections.reason: Plante driving. Speed 125 is the highest in the field. 9-2 ML is a massive overlay if that figure holds.

selections.name: Makemealegend
selections.reason: Thiessen driving. 3-1 ML favorite, but speed 95 is low compared to others. Vulnerable favorite.

danger_horse.name: Vogue Blue Chip
danger_horse.reason: Jamieson driving. Speed 125 matches the #6. A serious contender despite the post.

selections.name: All Gas No Brakes
selections.reason: Davis driving. Speed 121. Inside post allows for a protected trip. 3-1 ML is fair.

selections.name: Dahlquist Hanover
selections.reason: Thiessen driving. Speed 124 is the field best. Post 8 is the only negative.

selections.name: Tactical Strike
selections.reason: Young driving. Speed 121. Consistent runner who fits well in this class structure.

danger_horse.name: Spartan General
danger_horse.reason: Macdonald driving. Speed 121. Dangerous with the driver change.

selections.name: Pemberton
selections.reason: Class of the field (Open/Preferred type). Speed 126. Macdonald driving. Should handle post 9 easily.

selections.name: Quebec Hanover
selections.reason: Roy driving. Speed 127 is actually higher than the favorite. The main threat.

selections.name: Veracruz
selections.reason: McClure driving. Speed 120. Solid contender for the minor spoils.

danger_horse.name: Ghostly Casper
danger_horse.reason: McNair driving. Speed 121. Rail horse could sit the pocket and get a piece.

selections.name: Daffy Hanover
selections.reason: Cullen driving. Speed 112 is strong for this NW3 class. 3-1 ML is solid value.

selections.name: Pier Ho Emerald
selections.reason: Jones driving. Speed 111. Draws inside the favorite and has the speed to challenge.

selections.name: Greenleaf
selections.reason: Plante driving. Speed 103. Consistent check-getter.

danger_horse.name: Crypto Hanover
danger_horse.reason: Jamieson driving. 4-1 ML. Speed 76 seems low, but connections command respect.
